snippet: From neurotic American parents, convinced the French parent better, to our own editor, who worries about raising his kids in Britain, Rendezvous is wondering, 'What about the children?'
abstract: From neurotic American parents, convinced the French parent better, to our own editor, who worries about raising his kids in Britain, Rendezvous is wondering, 'What about the children?'

headline.main: Where Do Our Global Children Belong?
